ctx: intros d c pl pl0 tl H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA c : ad pl, pl0 : prec_list H1 : mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) H2 : state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tnil) Unable to unify "state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c tnil)" with "state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c tnil)".

ctx: intros d c pl pl0 tl H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA c : ad pl, pl0 : prec_list t : term tl : term_list H1 : mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl) (M1 prec_list c pl0) H2 : state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c (tcons t tl)) Unable to unify "state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list c pl) (app c (tcons t tl))" with "state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 c pl (M1 prec_list c pl0)) (app c (tcons t tl))".

original: intros d c pl pl0 tl H1 H2. unfold mpl_compat, state_reconnait in H1. unfold union_mpl_0 in H1. unfold state_reconnait. unfold state_reconnait in H2. destruct tl. - apply H2. - apply H2.
